title: US Stocks Led by Tech End Lower Ahead of Key Economic Data
description: US stocks fell on Monday as a selloff in technology shares continued and traders readied themselves for a swath of economic data.
content: US stocks fell on Monday as a selloff in technology shares continued and traders readied themselves for a swath of economic data.
